str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Of Hebrew origin; Jacob, the progenitor of the Israelites.
A fountain, spring, well, issue, flow. Probably from pegnumi; a fount, i.e. Source or supply.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From a derivative of kopos; to feel fatigue; by implication, to work hard.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A journey, journeying, travel. From the same as hodoiporeo; travel.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be sitting, sit down, be seated. From kata and the base of hedraios; to sit down.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A fountain, spring, well, issue, flow. Probably from pegnumi; a fount, i.e. Source or supply.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
